analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Pairs of Doctrinal Ideas
The Dyad on Unassociated with Corruptions and with Corruptible

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati🔽hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na sa asavam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ na sa asavaḥ dhammo uppajjati  hetu paccayā āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ
translated: With a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-not-corruptible state as condition, a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-not-corruptible state arises.🔽With a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-not-corruptible state as condition, a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-corruptible state arises.

original: nasāsavo ca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sa āsavaḥ ca āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-not-corruptible state as condition, a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-not-corruptible state and a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-corruptible state arise.🔽With a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-corruptible state as condition, a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-corruptible state arises.🔽With a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-corruptible state as condition, a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-not-corruptible state arises.

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavañca āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na sāsavam ca āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam ca dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-corruptible state as condition, a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-not-corruptible state and a conditionally-arisen unassociated-with-corruptions-and-corruptible state arise. (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro
